item.trans: adj. 可预防的；可阻止的；可防止的 同义词:avertible These rules are intended to prevent accidents.这些规则旨在防止事故发生。
vt. 歧视；区别；辨别 vi. 歧视；区别；辨别 同义词:tell from, distinguish from, tell from, distinguish from The president discriminates in favour of his relatives.总裁优待他的亲戚。
n. 响应能力；有同情心 Go to the nearest casualty , provided it is safe , and check for responsiveness .如果是安全的，那么走近最近的伤员，检查他的反应。
adj. 微妙的；精美的，雅致的；柔和的；易碎的；纤弱的；清淡可口的 同义词:subtle, female, refined, fine, fragile What a delicate work of art !多精美的一件艺术品啊！
n. 退休，退役 同义词:superannuation Yet many are well past normal retirement age .然而，许多人都过了正常退休年龄。
n. 轻拍；少量；熟手；比目鱼 v. 轻拍；涂；轻擦；轻敷（过去式dabbed，过去分词dabbed，现在分词dabbing，第三人称单数dabs） 同义词:bit, ounce, tipped The girl dabbed her eyes with the handkerchief.这小女孩用手帕轻擦眼睛
vt. 添后缀 n. 后缀；下标 同义词:sufix, postfix The details about the data suffix the text.详细的数据附加在正文的后面。
n. 开业者，从业者 Socrates was the greatest practitioner of this analytical search for fundamental assumptions .苏格拉底是这种以理性分析法探求基本假设的最伟大的实践者。
n. 火花；朝气；闪光 vt. 发动；鼓舞；求婚 vi. 闪烁；发火花；求婚 同义词:A FRAME, scintilla, stimulate, launch, lift, drive, spirit, offer, coruscate Their eyes sparked with green in the dark night.在黑暗的夜里，他们的眼睛会发出绿色的闪光。
n. 烤肉；吃烤肉的野宴 vt. 烧烤；烤肉 同义词:bulgogi, bar-b-q They barbecued several pieces of beef, fowl and fish.他们在户外烤了几块肉、鸡和鱼。
vt. 迷惑；逃避；使失望 同义词:escape, fail Her conceit deluded her into believing she was important.她的自负诱使她相信是自命不凡的。
n. [矿物] 黄铁矿 同义词:kies, brassil The extracting iron pyrite cinder by reductive roasting and sulfuric acid leaching was investigated .研究了高温还原焙烧、硫酸浸取提取硫铁矿烧渣中的铁。
n. 英语字母中的第五个字母 Might e - readers provide a new model for newspapers in the digital age ?电子阅读器能为报纸提供数字时代的发展新模式吗？

adj. 直的；连续的；笔直的；正直的；整齐的 adv. 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地 n. 直；直线 同义词:continuing, endless, ordered, regular, running, constantly, directly, forever, rapidly, continually, beeline, gerade Tell us the straight of it .告诉我们事情的真相吧。
n. 奢侈，奢华；奢侈品；享受 adj. 奢侈的 同义词:enjoyment, luxe, extravagant, Lucullian The business concept behind the Hoxton is described as " luxury budget".霍克顿背后的商业概念可以形容为“廉价豪华”。
n. 烟草，烟叶；烟草制品；抽烟 同义词:smoke, baccy The first 50 years of the " cigarette century " were a golden era for Big Tobacco .对于大型烟草商而言，“卷烟世纪”的前50年是一个黄金时代。
vi. 回答；作出反应；承担责任 vt. 以…回答 n. 应答；唱和 同义词:reply, answer, answering She responded briefly to the questions.她对这些问题作了简要的答复。
vi. 爬行；匍匐行进 vt. 爬行；缓慢地行进 n. 爬行；养鱼池；匍匐而行 同义词:creep, creep, aquarium A child learns to crawl before he learns to walk.小孩在学走路之前先学爬。
n. 义务；职责；债务 同义词:debt, liability The obligation of cohabitation of spouses is the basis of marital rights .夫妻间的同居义务是夫妻其他权利与义务的基础。

n. 对手；竞争者 vt. 与…竞争；比得上某人 vi. 竞争 adj. 竞争的 同义词:equal, comparative, opponent, match, adversary, match, compete against, contest, cope, struggle to, competitive, vying The two students rivaled each other for the scholarship.这两个学生为获得奖学金而互相竞争。
n. 位置（形容词locational）；地点；外景拍摄场地 同义词:site, situation, spot, lie, where The location of the glioma must also be considered when deciding treatment .在决定治疗措施前也必须考虑神经胶质瘤的位置。
n. 选择，挑选；选集；精选品 同义词:chose, choice, pick Compute selection information before backup and restore operations .进行备份和还原前，计算选择信息。
vt. 抹去；擦除 vi. 被擦去，被抹掉 同义词:efface to erase pencil marks擦去铅笔记号(或笔迹)
n. 心灵手巧，独创性；精巧；精巧的装置 同义词:originality, elaboration We harness the skills and ingenuity of the most dynamic country on Earth to reach a better day .我们能利用世界上最具活力的国家的所有技术和聪明才智创造美好的未来。
n. 提升，[劳经] 晋升；推销，促销；促进；发扬，振兴 同义词:advancement, acceleration, impetus We figure you would want to celebrate your promotion .我们以为你会想要庆祝自己升职呢。
n. 氯化物 同义词:muriate The reactions are conveniently studied using a solution of titanium chloride .用氯化钛溶液可以很方便地研究钛的反应。
n. 服装；衣服 vt. 给…穿衣 同义词:clothes, garment, array, wear, thread, dress, clothe He is gorgeously appareled.他穿着华丽。
n. 高潮；顶点；层进法；极点 同义词:height, summit, sky, peak, pole His election to the presidency climaxed his political career.他的当选为总统使他的政治生涯达到最高峰。
n. [数] 命题；提议；主题；议题 vt. 向…提议；向…求欢 同义词:sentence, theme, subject, offer She was propositioned several times in the course of the evening.整个晚上有人几次向她提出非分要求
n. 珠子；滴；念珠 vi. 形成珠状，起泡 vt. 用珠装饰；使成串珠状 同义词:drop, gutta, foam formation The perspiration beaded his face.成串的汗珠挂在他的脸上。
adj. 可理解的；明了的；仅能用智力了解的 同义词:accessible, comprehensible She could hear the questions and gave intelligible answers .她能聆听问题，并给予适切的答案。
n. 数据（datum的复数）；资料 The police had the leader in the movement dataed.警察收集了有关这次运动的领导人的情报。
n. 草地；牧场；牧草 vt. 放牧；吃草 同义词:grass, field, lawn, meadow, grass, feed, range The shepherd pastured his sheep on the village common.羊倌在村庄的公地上放羊。
n. 狂怒；暴怒；激怒者 同义词:agriothymia, hopping mad " Beware the fury of a patient man " (John Dryden ).“当心容忍者的暴怒”（约翰·德莱顿）。
vt. 集合，聚集；装配；收集 vi. 集合，聚集 同义词:aggregate, fall in, concentrate, collect, aggregate, mass, crowd The students assembled (或were assembled) in the school hall.学生们在学校礼堂集合。
adj. 无关紧要的 同义词:indifferent, small-beer On the other hand, even in the pro -whaling countries , whaling is an insignificant and dying industry .另一方面，甚至在“倾捕”的国家里，捕鲸也只是个无足轻重、日薄西山的行业。
n. 债券；结合；约定；粘合剂 vi. 结合，团结在一起 vt. 使结合；以…作保 同义词:combination, convention, coupling, wedding, adhesive, couple, become one, combine, combine, tie in Use this glue to bond the two materials.用这胶水黏合这两种材料。
n. 不足，缺乏（shortage的复数形式） 同义词:deficiencies, scarcities In 2009 fear of food shortages caused trouble throughout Africa .2009年食物短缺的恐惧给全非洲带来了麻烦。
vt. 使适应；改编 vi. 适应 同义词:condition, suit, season, adjust, accomodate to, accommodate to I suggested he should adapt himself to his new conditions.我认为他应该使自己适应新的情况。
n. 障碍；不利条件，不利的因素 vt. 妨碍，阻碍；使不利 同义词:obstacle, let, bar, dam, disadvantage, let, slow He was handicapped by his height.他的身高妨碍了他的发展。
n. [脊椎] 猿；傻瓜；模仿者 vt. 模仿；抢台词 adj. 狂热的 同义词:stupid, fool, simulate, pattern, imitate, crazy, wild, enthusiastic, fanatical to ape another's style of writing模仿别人的文体
adv. 因此，于是；相应地；照著 同义词:therefore, hence, consequently, thus, then Please amend your copy of the contract accordingly .请将你的合同副本做相应地修正。
adj. 综合的；合成的，人造的 n. 合成物 同义词:comprehensive, integrated, artificial, general, composition Highly flammable synthetic materials should be avoided .高度易燃的合成材料应被避免。

vi. 拖欠；不履行；不到场 n. 违约；缺席；缺乏；系统默认值 vt. 不履行；不参加（比赛等）；对…处以缺席裁判 同义词:fall behind, lag behind, shortage, deficiency, need, drought, short of, walk out on sth., unsatisfy to default on(或in)an engagement,claim or obligation不履行约言、主张或义务
vt. 疏忽，忽视；忽略 n. 疏忽，忽视；怠慢 同义词:ignore, be forgetful of, omission, oversight His genius was neglected for several years.他的创造能力被忽视了好几年。
adv. 同样地；类似于 同义词:equally, same, as, likewise Similarly , a condensate moves along a magnetic matter waveguide as a beam of matter .同样地，凝聚态以物质波束的型态能顺著磁性物质波导移动。
vt. 承认；坦白；忏悔；供认 vi. 承认；坦白；忏悔；供认 同义词:accept, recognize, agree, acknowledge, grant, accept, recognize Now, I must confess that I'm at my wit's end.现在我必须承认我已毫无办法。
vt. 使兴旺；发隆隆声 vi. 急速发展；发隆隆声 n. 繁荣；吊杆；隆隆声 同义词:prosperity, up, speed The guns boomed again.枪炮又发出砰砰声。
adj. 积极的；[数] 正的，[化学][医] 阳性的；确定的，肯定的；实际的，真实的；绝对的 n. 正数；[摄] 正片 同义词:active, established, practical, actual, fixed, effective, sincere I choose the positive side of life .我选择了指出生活积极的一面。
adj. 芳香的；愉快的 同义词:sweet, good, bright, aromatic The decision to do right lives fresh fragrant in our memory .这个决定是对的鲜活的存在我们的记忆中。
vi. 出现；显得；似乎；出庭 同义词:occur, figure, offer, come out A woman suddenly appeared in the doorway.一个女人蓦地出现在门口。
adj. 营养的；滋养的 同义词:trophic, alimentary Moist heat treatment inactivates the anti nutritional factors present .温热处理可以抑制抗营养的因素出现。
n. [化学] 钙 Water contains calcium , iron and other minerals .水中含有钙、铁和其他矿物质。
n. 娱乐；消遣；休养 同义词:entertainment, pleasure, sport, occupation, amusement My only recreation has been watching TV .我惟一的娱乐就是看电视。
vi. 浮现；摆脱；暴露 同义词:ray, cast off The sun emerges from behind the clouds.太阳从云层里露出。
vt. 污染；使中毒，放毒于；败坏；阻碍 vi. 放毒，下毒 n. 毒药，毒物；酒；有毒害的事物；[助剂] 抑制剂 adj. 有毒的 同义词:slow, pollute, wine, liquor, drink, toxic, virous, venenous His wife poisoned him with arsenic.他妻子用砒霜把他毒死了。
n. [化学] 臭氧；新鲜的空气 They think ozone in the air is keeping bees and other pollinators from smelling the flowers .他们认为大气中的臭氧会使蜜蜂和其他传粉者无法闻到花的味道。
n. 持续；固执；存留 同义词:duration, standing Persistence , patience , self-confidence and determination are badly needed .坚持、耐心、自信和决心是迫切需要的。
vi. 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判 n. 呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判 vt. 将…上诉，对…上诉 同义词:attract, clamour for, asking, request, motion, charm to appeal a case to a higher tribunal把案件向高一级法院上诉
vt. 吸入；猛吃猛喝 vi. 吸气 同义词:inbreathe, to breathe in, air intake, to breathe in to inhale air吸入空气
vt. 配音；轻点；打击；授予称号 n. 笨蛋；鼓声 同义词:dong, have at, simple, turkey, put, idiot, stupid The king dubbed Tom a knight.国王封汤姆为爵士。
vi. 褪色；凋谢；逐渐消失 vt. 使褪色 adj. 平淡的；乏味的 n. [电影][电视] 淡出；[电影][电视] 淡入 同义词:peter, color fading, discolor, stupid, literal-minded The blue rug has faded over years.蓝色的地毯多年后已经褪色了。

adj. [力] 离心的；远中的 n. 离心机；转筒 同义词:acentric, exodic, revolving drum, rotating drum Centrifugal casting , compact structure , free from pinhole porosity and slag , smooth surface and even wall thickness .高速离心铸造，组织致密，无砂眼、夹渣，表面光滑、壁厚均匀。
vt. 谴责；判刑，定罪；声讨 同义词:denounce, deplore Most people condemn war.大多数人都谴责战争。
prep. 超过；越过；那一边；在...较远的一边 adv. 在远处；在更远处 n. 远处 同义词:above, without, than, over, past, away, afar, yon Beyond those trees you'll find a summer house.在树林的那边你将找到一间避暑别墅。
n. 杂乱，混乱 vt. 使凌乱；胡乱地填满 同义词:chaos, disorder, confusion, involvement, mix Newspapers and magazines cluttered the bedroom.卧室里到处都是报纸和杂志。

adj. 复杂的；合成的 n. 复合体；综合设施 同义词:sophisticated, involved, synthetic, detailed, intricate Predictions about a mechanism as complex as the climate cannot be made with any certainty .对某种机制的预测就像不能作出任何肯定的气候预测一样复杂。
n. 帮助；助攻 vi. 参加；出席 vt. 帮助；促进 Please assist her in moving the furniture.请帮助她搬家具。
adj. 无家可归的 同义词:displaced, roofless What are some reasons that people become homeless ?人们变成无家可归的原因有那些？
n. 垃圾填埋地；垃圾堆 同义词:laystall, rubbish dump The firm 's liability lasts as long as landfill continues to generate leachate or gas .只要垃圾填埋场继续产生渗虑液或排放沼气，公司就得负责到底。
n. 肥皂泡；激动 vt. 涂以肥皂泡；使紧张；狠狠地打 vi. 起泡沫 同义词:warmth, excitation, tension, stress, foam, spume to lather one's face before shaving在刮脸之前涂上皂沫
n. 训练；钻孔机；钻子；播种机 vi. 钻孔；训练 vt. 钻孔；训练；条播 同义词:training, discipline, bore a hole, counter sunk, discipline, coach to drill boulders for inserting dynamite在巨石上打眼以便装炸药
vt. 执行；完成；演奏 vi. 执行，机器运转；表演 同义词:accomplish, implement, achieve, complete, fulfil, put into effect, to carry out The doctor performed the operation yesterday.昨天大夫进行了一例手术。
n. 梳子；蜂巢；鸡冠 vt. 梳头发；梳毛 vi. （浪）涌起 同义词:crista galli, cockscomb, upsurge If you combed your hair more often you wouldn't look so untidy.如果你勤梳着点你的头发，就不会显得那么邋遢了。
vt. 使潮湿；使阻尼；使沮丧，抑制 vi. 减幅，阻尼；变潮湿 n. 潮湿，湿气 adj. 潮湿的 同义词:control, stay, restrain, moisturize, moisture, humidity, wet, wet, humid, moisty to damp clothes before ironing them在熨衣服前把它们喷湿
n. 时髦；别致的款式 adj. 别致的 同义词:stylishness, trendiness, picturesque " Chic clothes but empty faces , " she said .“穿着时尚，面无表情，”她说道。
n. 药剂师 同义词:dispenser, apothecary Ask your doctor or pharmacist .询问你的医生或药剂师。
adj. 致命的；重大的；毁灭性的；命中注定的 同义词:important, significant, great, fell, kill In drivers and workers it can lead to fatal accidents .这在司机或工人身上可能引发致命的事故。

vt. 使…完整；使…成整体；求…的积分；表示…的总和 vi. 求积分；取消隔离；成为一体 adj. 整合的；完全的 n. 一体化；集成体 同义词:become one flesh, complete, absolute, full, total, round, gleichschaltung to integrate the residential blocks with the rest of the college使住宿区与大学其他部分连成一体
vi. 发霉 vt. 浇铸；用泥土覆盖 n. 模具；霉 同义词:go moldy, cast, typecast, mildew These huge presses mould the car bodies.这些巨大的压床模压出汽车车身。

adj. 神圣的；非凡的；天赐的；极好的 vt. 占卜；预言；用占卜勘探 vi. 占卜；预言；使用占卜勘探矿 n. 牧师；神学家 同义词:remarkable, extraordinary, wonderful, excellent, famous, predict, prognosticate, soothsay, minister, priest, preacher At last I divined the truth.最后我发现了事情的真相。
n. 环境，情况；事件；境遇 同义词:context, situation, setting, event, occurrence, thing, scene In any circumstance where light is being absorbed , there is a pressure.在任何情况下，凡在光被吸收的地方，就有光压。
n. 非正式；不拘礼节 同义词:without ceremony This informality made the war a lot of fun for Scarlett .这种不正常的状况使思嘉觉得战争还是相当有趣的。
adj. 人口统计学的；人口学的 同义词:larithmic Demographic factors . Gender , age , family size , and so on.人口统计因素：性别，年龄、家庭规模等等。
adj. 反对的；不愿意的 同义词:anti, unwilling When the dollar falls , as it has since March , risk - averse investors tend to buy gold .美元自三月份起一直下跌，下跌时，规避风险的投资商倾向于购买黄金。
n. 障碍；错误 vt. 阻止；推诿；错过 vi. 犹豫；突然止步不前 同义词:error, mistake, obstacle, let, bar, stem, block, dispute, lose, prohibit, daiker, hang back He balked at making the suggestion.他畏缩不肯提建议。
n. 电子 同义词:elektron Much greater magnification can be obtained with the electron microscope .用电子显微镜能获得大得多的放大倍数。
n. 性质，性能；财产；所有权 同义词:performance, nature, ownership, estate, capability By appreciation , we make excellence in others our own property .欣赏能使别人的卓越成为我们自己的财富。

adj. 主要的；最好的；基本的 adv. 极好地 n. 初期；青年；精华；全盛时期 vt. 使准备好；填装 vi. 作准备 同义词:greatest, major, elementary, central, main, excellently, famously, youth, morning, essence, elite, flower, ready, provide to prime an explosive device使爆炸装置准备起爆
n. 温度 All other common gases are cooled by expansion temperature and below it.所有其它普通气体在室温和室温以下时都会因膨胀而冷却。
pron. 我 n. 碘元素；英语字母I You and I.你和我。
n. 服装，装束；戏装，剧装 vt. 给…穿上服装 同义词:clothing, wear, garment, apparel The leading role in the film is costumed in medieval armor.影片中的主角穿着中古时代的甲胄。
n. 跳板；出发点 vi. 利用跳板跃进 同义词:walks, gang-plank She won the women's national springboard championship in1963 .她在1963年全国女子跳板跳水比赛中得了冠军。
vt. 提高；加强；增加 同义词:raise, cement, boost, muscle, gain The candlelight enhanced her beauty.烛光使她显得更美。
adj. 可疑的；怀疑的；多疑的 同义词:doubtful, questionable Her initial symptoms were suspicious -loss of appetite , general fatigue , and dark urine .她最初的症状很值得怀疑：食欲减退、周身乏力、尿色加深。
adj. 天上的；神圣的；天国似的 adv. 无比；极其 同义词:sacred, blessed, extremely, most, rare It 's really heavenly here . It's not hot at all.这里真是人间天堂。天气一点也不热。
vt. 指导；通知；命令；教授 同义词:require, teach, coach, message, order to instruct somebody in English教某人英语
adj. 不变的；恒定的；经常的 n. [数] 常数；恒量 同义词:permanent, steady, invariable They face a constant battle to protect pockets of high profits and have few chances to grow .他们面临一场保护高额利润口袋持久的战斗，这些利润很少有机会增加。
n. [化学] 钾 同义词:kalium It also contains potassium and is one of the few foods that contain large amounts of lycopene .还含有钾元素。同时，西瓜还是含有大量番茄红素的少数食物之一。
n. [昆] 蚜虫 同义词:budworm, greenfly The reproduction rate of the aphid is influenced by nutrition .蚜虫的繁殖率受到营养的影响。
adj. 秘书的；书记的；部长的 同义词:ministerial, clerical Yes , she runs a secretarial agency from home .是的，她在家里经营一个秘书公司。
n. 斜体字，斜体 同义词:italic type This example is printed in italics .这个例句是用斜体字排印的。
adj. 有历史意义的；历史上著名的 The defeat of the coup gave Russia an historic chance to liquidate the organisation .这次政变失败为俄罗斯扫清克格勃组织提供了历史的机会。
n. 乡愁 同义词:nostalgia These fond recollections lingered with me like a kind of homesickness , leaving me dejected .一个能说出乡愁的男人，他一定是个爱家、家、家庭责任感的人。
n. 英语字母中的第二十一个字母；铀（化学元素） Shoes fixed while U wait.补鞋立等可取。
n. 食物；营养品；滋养品 同义词:nutrition, diet, eating But it is too late to try for strength now through nourishment .不过要想靠营养来增强力气，如今已经太晚了。

n. 联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府 同义词:alliance, combined with, union, unity, combination, association Australia , now part of the federation , is a stronger continental challenger than either Japan or Korea , the joint hosts in 2002 .现在加入亚足联的澳大利亚，比起联合主办2002年世界杯的日本韩国来，是更有力的挑战者。
vt. 削，凿；削成碎片 vi. 剥落；碎裂 n. [电子] 芯片；筹码；碎片 同义词:pele, whittle, shell, flake off, debris, patch She chipped one of my best glasses.她碰碎了我最好的玻璃杯。
adv. 随时地；暂时地；立刻 同义词:briefly, soon, immediately, now, shortly Her beauty left me momentarily speechless .她的美使我一时哑然失踪。
n. 气象状态，气象学 同义词:aerography, meteorological optics Meteorology is the study of the atmosphere and its phenomena and the weather .气象学是对于大气、大气的现象与天气的研究。
n. 安慰；慰问；起安慰作用的人或事物 同义词:comfort, relief, sympathy My only consolation is your letters and phone calls .你的来信和来电是我唯一的慰藉。
n. 性能；绩效；表演；执行 同义词:property, capability, enforcement, execution, implementing Our music teacher will give us extra credit if we write a report on the performance .如果我们写一个表演的报告的话英语老师将会给我们额外的学分。
n. 风景，景色；山水画 vt. 美化…景观 vi. 从事景观美化工作 同义词:scenery, view, picture, prospect, outlook The path is landscaped with willows along its two sides.小路两旁柳树成行，景色宜人。
n. 瓷；瓷器 adj. 瓷制的；精美的 同义词:china, stoneware, china, delicate, fine Excessive detonation has caused the porcelain on this plug to break away .过分的爆炸会引起火花塞上的陶瓷头的破裂。
n. 疲劳，疲乏；杂役 vt. 使疲劳；使心智衰弱 vi. 疲劳 adj. 疲劳的 同义词:tiredness, weariness, wear down, tire Climbing the mountain fatigued the whole scout troop.登山使整个侦察连感到疲劳。
n. 啤酒厂 Until the nineteenth century , yeasts for bread making were obtained directly from the nearest brewery .直到十九世纪，面包用酵母都是直接从最近处的啤酒厂取得的。
adj. 周围的，附近的 n. 环境，周围的事物 同义词:environmental, ambient, context, circumstance, setting, condition Explosions release huge clouds of gas that envelop the surrounding area .爆炸释放出大量的气体云足可以笼罩整个地区。
vt. 使复杂化；使恶化；使卷入 同义词:aggravate, exacerbate You mustn’t complicate the problem by raising new issues.你千万不要提出新的争端使问题更加复杂化。

n. 会计，会计学；帐单 v. 解释（account的ing形式）；叙述 同义词:treasurer, rechnung, relating, explaining Cost accounting systems provide timely unit product costs through the use of perpetual inventory procedures.成本会计系统通过使用永续盘存制定期提供产品的单位成本。
vt. 筑堤围堵；以堤围绕；以堤防堵挡 to embank a river筑堤断流
n. 渴望；抱负；呼气；吸引术 同义词:longing for, eagerness Young Edison had a aspiration to be an inventor .年幼的爱迪生就渴望成为一名发明家。
vt. 引起；创作 vi. 发源；发生；起航 同义词:attract, produce, cause, occasion, operate, happen, occur, proceed The film originated from a novel.这部电影源自一部小说。
adj. 理想主义的；唯心论的；唯心主义者的；空想家的 同义词:spiritualistic They are sensible enough, though some, like a moratorium on bilateral trade deals , seem overly idealistic .这些想法很合理，但是像暂停双边贸易这些想法似乎太过理想主义了。
n. 王冠；花冠；王权；顶点 vt. 加冕；居…之顶；表彰；使圆满完成 同义词:height, sky, summit, peak, lei, coronate, cite British kings are crowned in Westminster Abbey.英国国王都在威斯敏斯特教堂加冕。
adj. 好的（等于good） 同义词:good, ok, fine, great, bon A bona fide holder for value takes free from any defect in the title of his predecessors.有价证券善持有人有受前手所有权缺陷的影响。
n. 个性；个人；个人特征；个人的嗜好（通常复数） 同义词:personality, kidney When adults encounter this unique display of individuality expressed by an infant , they're usually surprised .当大人们看见婴儿用自己独特的方式表达自己，他们通常会吃惊。
vt. 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编 同义词:to edit, copy-edit It often takes five or six years of hard work to compile a good dictionary.编一部好的词典常常需要苦干五六年。
n. 多功能性；多才多艺；用途广泛 同义词:multifunctionality Their versatility makes them extremely useful for medical research .它们的多功能性非常适合用于医疗研究。
vt. 插入；嵌入 n. 插入物 同义词:bed, build in, inlet, impaler to insert a bookmark into a book把书签插入书中
n. 解剖；解剖学；剖析；骨骼 同义词:cadre, dissection Is it harassment if a man stares at a woman 's anatomy , or tells an off- color joke ?如果一个男人瞪着眼睛看一个女人的生理部位，或说“黄色”笑话，这是不是性骚扰？
n. 生态系统 同义词:ecological constellation, ecological systems The Amazon River is one of the great rivers of the world and a complex and exotic ecosystem .亚马逊河是世界上伟大的河流之一，是一个复杂的奇异的生态系统。

n. 瑕疵，裂纹；缺点；一阵狂风 vt. 使无效；使破裂，使有缺陷 vi. 生裂缝，变的有缺陷 同义词:checking, defect, deficiency, vice, fault, crack, fracture The failure to reduce oil dependence is not the only flaw in the ethanol program .降低对石油依赖失败的原因不是因为乙醇项目存在问题。
n. 让步；特许（权）；承认；退位 同义词:recognition, license It is some concession .这已是一些让步了。
vt. 俘获；夺得 n. 捕获；战利品，俘虏 同义词:snatch, taking, prize, acquiring They captured more than ten thousand prisoners and large quantities of arms in that campaign.他们在那次战役中俘获了一万多战俘和大量武器。
n. 不确定，不可靠 同义词:indetermination, unsureness And uncertainty affects behaviour , which feeds the crisis .不确定性影响着孕育危机的行为。
vt. 分配；拨出；使坐落于 vi. 分配；指定 同义词:portion, part, appropriate, parcel out, to assign The Government has allocated funds for housing.政府已为住房建筑拨给资金。
adv. 在次页；在背面 adj. 背面的；次页的 同义词:rear Before you sign this form , please refer to the remarks overleaf .请于签署前，参阅背页所列之备注。
vt. 雕刻；铭记 同义词:brand, heart, grave She engraved the ring in a floral pattern.她把戒指刻成花卉图案。
n. 截面；部门；地区；章节 vi. 被切割成片；被分成部分 vt. 把…分段；将…切片；对…进行划分 同义词:ministry, region, division, department, area the poor sections of the city该市中的贫民区
adj. 气喘的；似患气喘的 n. 气喘患者 同义词:wheezy As I remember , my brother and sister both had severe asthmatic attacks in the childhood .我记得，我弟弟和妹妹小时候都得过严重的哮喘病。
n. [数] 公式，准则；配方；婴儿食品 同义词:criterion, expressions We need , in short , an assessment formula .简言之，我们需要一个摊派方案。
n. 殖民地居民 adj. 殖民地的，殖民的 France was a colonial ruler in Africa and still has influence on the continent.法国以前是非洲的殖民统治者，现在仍对该地区留有影响。
n. 障碍，干扰；妨害物 同义词:interference, let, bar, disturbance, dam Another obstacle is inertia .另一个阻碍是惰性。
